func_sig.description: Calculate the distance between two points in a 2D space given their coordinates.
func_sig.name: calculate_distance

x1.description: The x-coordinate of the first point.

y1.description: The y-coordinate of the first point.

y2.description: The y-coordinate of the second point.

func_sig.description: Evaluate arithmetic or mathematical expressions provided as strings.

func_sig.description: Calculate how many pounds of corn and beans based on given weights and costs in a single function.
func_sig.name: add_weighted_items

total_weight.description: Total weight of corn and beans.

func_sig.name: calculate_costs

total_weight.description: Total weight of corn and beans.

func_sig.description: Evaluate a constant function that always returns a specific value.
func_sig.name: evaluate_constant_function

costs.description: An object mapping item names to their costs per unit.
